title: Iran's motorcycling midwife and rights campaigner is star of Oscar-tipped film
summary_full: In a room of 1,500 men, Sara Shahverdi becomes the only female leader in her region of Iran - a new film joins her as she pushes for change.
summary_public: In a room of 1,500 men, Sara Shahverdi becomes the only female leader in her region of Iran - a new film joins her as she pushes for change.
